customValue.label: At least one borrower's credit score exceeded the maximum age allowed by the lender
At least one borrower does not have a clean credit history
Cash out amount has exceeded the maximum amount allowed by the lender
Cash out amount has exceeded the maximum percentage of the security value allowed by the lender
DSCR exceeds the threshold allowed by the lender
DTA exceeds the threshold allowed by the lender
DTI exceeds the threshold allowed by the lender
HUR exceeds the threshold allowed by the lender
IDH exceeds the threshold allowed by the lender
NDI exceeds the threshold allowed by the lender
No borrower has met the minimum employment eligibility time requirements
No borrower has met the minimum employment eligibility type requirements
No borrower has met the minimum employment probation eligibility requirements
No products matched the customer's specific criteria
One or more borrowers is not a citizen or permanent resident
One or more of the borrowers isn't old enough
Properties in this location are not allowed for this loan purpose (new purchase, refi, etc)
Properties in this location are not allowed for this purchase reason (INV or OO)
Properties in this location are not allowed for this repayment type (IO or P&I)
The genuine savings contribution doesn't meet the minimum requirements
The loan amount exceeds the maximum loan amount allowed by the lender
The loan amount is below the minimum loan amount allowed by the lender
The loan to value ratio has exceeded the maximum allowed for this loan
The number of debts being consolidated is greater than the number allowed by the lender
The property being purchased is under the minimum allowed size
The property security is in a restricted postcode
The security location wasn't found in the lender's location tables
The total amount of debt consolidated has exceeded the maximum percentage allowed by the lender
This lender doesn't allow interest only repayments
This lender doesn't allow principle and interest repayments
UMI exceeds the threshold allowed by the lender
The applicants on the loan do not match the owners of the property being refinanced
